      • createAlertDialogPopup

        public static android.support.v7.app.AlertDialog createAlertDialogPopup(Activity activity,
                                                                        java.lang.String yes,
                                                                        java.lang.String no,
                                                                        java.lang.String title,
                                                                        java.lang.String message,
                                                                        boolean dismissable,
                                                                        OnTaskCompleteListener listener)
        Creates an AlertDialog
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity this is being called from
        yes - What you want it to say in the "Yes" button (Generally just Yes). If null passed, it will remove the option entirely. IE, if you only want "Ok" as an option
        no - What you want it to say in the "No" button (Generally just No). If null passed, it will remove the option entirely. IE, if you only want "Ok" as an option
        title - the String title to be displayed. If null, no title will be set
        message - the message you want displayed in the dialog popup. If null, no message will be set.
        dismissable - Boolean, if true, it will be allowed dismissable/ cancelable, if false, it will not
        listener - The onTaskComplete listener that will send back the results to the activity
